key_changes: Updated NewExecutor to accept ExecutorOption variadic parameters
Added middleware chain support in Execute method
Refactored execution flow to support middleware and panic recovery

patterns_discovered: Flexible configuration through functional options pattern
Middleware chain implementation for extensible execution pipeline
Explicit error and panic handling strategies
Layered execution with base, middleware, and recovery functions
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle default configuration when no options provided
Multiple layers of panic recovery might cause complexity
Potential performance overhead with middleware chain
recommendations: Add comprehensive unit tests for middleware chain scenarios
Document middleware usage and best practices
Consider performance benchmarking of middleware implementation
Provide clear examples of middleware composition in documentation
